name: Speed 2D!
description:
Latest version: 0.004e (The apps for desktop are still 0.002e)

THIS GAME IS STILL IN EARLY ACCESS! EXPECT SOME BUGS.SPEED 2D!

A simple 2D physics car game!

Reasons to play:
  • Highly addictive.
  • If you complete all the levels, you can play in "challenge mode".
  • Best game if you want to get frustrated.
  • If you hate yourself please play.
  • Good game.
  • Good game.
Download:

This highly frustrating/addictive game can be played on several devices.

  • macOS
  • Windows
  • Linux
  • Web

This game's release date has not been confirmed.

You can play early access here: https://friv432-tests.glitch.me/games/speed2d/play/, since this is still early access, expect some bugs. (Latest Version 0.004e)

The full web version will be released on our website: https://friv432.weebly.com.
